Zeppelin Pizza

When we first conceived the idea of a pizza joint, we realized we wanted to bring amazing pizza to Johns Island. Come join us at Zeppelin Pizza Co. in our full service restaurant—offering up apps, pizza, subs, salads and more.

Reviews

Review by - Yelp

Jeff D:

This restaurant had some of the best personal pizza I've ever had. My wife agreed, and said the same thing that I thought, the crust was excellent, and the pizza and the sauce and everything about it was high quality and great food...

Review by - Yelp

Crystal G:

Great pizza and wings. My family loves to go for dinner. Service is always great too.

Review by - Yelp

Jonathan A:

Best pizza on John's island. Great staff. I enjoy their food on a weekly basis. Great atmosphere in the restaurant. Great place to watch sports and listen to live music!

Review by - Yelp

Emily V:

Wonderful spot! We swung by after running some errands and will definitely be back. The fried Mozzarella is really good and their marinara is excellent. We split the white caps pizza and chicken parm sandwich - both were really good...

Review by - Yelp

Danika J:

Always consistent. Food is always delicious and delivered HOT. This is my go to for pizza but definitely tried many things and love the food...
